About Us

Welcome to our car dealership! We offer a wide selection of vehicles for both sale and rental. Our mission is to provide you with the best cars at the most affordable prices.

  • At McQue Motors, we're more than just a dealership; we're dedicated to providing an exceptional car-buying experience grounded in integrity and quality. Based in Sandton, Gauteng, our commitment extends beyond selling vehicles to ensuring that every customer drives away with complete satisfaction.
  • Our streamlined sales process includes a wide range of high-quality new and used cars, all priced affordably to fit various budgets. We offer straightforward trade-in options and transparent finance arrangements to make your purchase as smooth as possible.
  • What sets us apart is our unwavering dedication to delivering top-notch service. Our team is committed to making every visit enjoyable, from the first inquiry to the final handshake. We take pride in creating lasting relationships with our customers, who often return to McQue Motors for their future automotive needs.
  • Our goal is to make your car-buying journey seamless and rewarding. At McQue Motors, we’re not just selling cars; we’re building a community of satisfied customers who value quality, affordability, and exceptional service.

Our Vision

Our vision is to be the premier choice for car buyers in Gauteng, known for our commitment to quality, affordability, and exceptional service. We aim to build lasting relationships with our customers, ensuring that they return to McQue Motors for all their automotive needs.

Why Choose Us?

  • Top-Quality Vehicles: We pride ourselves on offering a diverse selection of high-quality cars, rigorously inspected to meet our standards.
  • Exceptional Customer Service: Our team is dedicated to providing a friendly, transparent, and efficient car-buying experience.
  • Affordable Prices: We strive to offer competitive pricing that makes owning a great car within reach for everyone.
  • Trusted Integrity: At McQue Motors, we build trust through honesty and a commitment to doing right by our customers.
  • Future Growth: Our plans for expansion reflect our dedication to continually improving and enhancing our services.
At McQue Motors, we’re not just selling cars; we’re creating lasting automotive relationships built on trust, quality, and exceptional service.

Our Mission

From day one, our mission has been clear: to deliver exceptional vehicles and unparalleled service while maintaining the highest standards of integrity. We wanted to create a place where customers could find their perfect car without the stress and uncertainty often associated with car buying.

Our Location
